name: San Remo Couscous
description: San Remo Couscous is produced from the finest quality Durum Wheat milled into fine semolina. Light and delicious, San Remo Couscous is a good source of fibre, 98% fat free and cooks in just 5 minutes. Couscous can be used to make delicious and healthy meals such as Prawn and Couscous Salad.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
